[[Version 1.1]]
*The description of Devotion was changed.
**{{Color|Old description:}} When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when <span class="bg-highlight">the</span> active character's HP falls below 30%:<br />Creates a shield that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF. This effect can only occur once every 60s.
**{{Color|New description:}} When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when <span class="bg-highlight">your</span> active character's HP falls below 30%:<br />Creates a shield <span class="bg-highlight">for your active character</span> that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF. This effect can only occur once every 60s.
